mapper.insert: insert into strategy (place_id, title, subTitle, coverUrl, state) values (#{place.id}, #{title}, #{subTitle}, #{coverUrl}, #{state})
mapper.update: update strategy set place_id = #{place.id}, title = #{title}, subTitle = #{subTitle}, coverUrl = #{coverUrl}, state = #{state} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, place_id, title, subTitle, coverUrl, state from strategy

select id, place_id, title, subTitle, coverUrl, state from strategy
and title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
